#!/bin/sh
### BEGIN INIT INFO
# Provides:          tigervncserver
# Required-Start:    $local_fs
# Required-Stop:     $local_fs
# Default-Start:     2 3 4 5
# Default-Stop:      0 1 6
# Short-Description: Start/stop tigervncserver
### END INIT INFO

### Customize this entry
# Set the USER variable to the name of the user to start tigervncserver under
export USER='bots'
### End customization required

eval cd ~$USER

case "$1" in
  start)
    su $USER -c '/usr/local/bin/vncserver :1'
    echo "Starting TigerVNC server for $USER "
    ;;
  stop)
    pkill Xtigervnc
    echo "Tigervncserver stopped"
    ;;
  *)
    echo "Usage: /etc/init.d/tigervncserver {start|stop}"
    exit 1
    ;;
esac
exit 0
